products.name: Samsung UN40EH5000 40" 1080p HD LED LCD Television
products.description:
Enjoy clear, crisp images, deep blacks and pure whites in 1080p resolution with this Samsung 40" LED HDTV that features Clear Motion Rate 120 and Wide Color Enhancer Plus technologies to bring your movies, games, sports and TV shows to life.

What's Included

  • Samsung 40" Class - LED - 1080p - 60Hz - HDTV
  • Stand
  • Owner's manual

Product Features

  • From our expanded online assortment; not available in all Best Buy stores
  • 40" screen measured diagonally from corner to corner For optimal viewing in medium-size rooms.
  • Slim design (3-3/4" deep) Ideal for wall mounting (with optional mounting kit, not included). VESA 200mm x 200mm compliant.
  • Clear Motion Rate 120 technology Brings movies, games, sports and TV shows to life with crisp, clear visuals.
  • Wide Color Enhancer Plus Delivers vibrant, natural-looking images.
  • 1080p display Provides the highest quality progressive-scan picture possible from a high-definition source.
  • Two 10W speakers Support multichannel sound (MTS) and second audio program (SAP) with 181-channel capacity. SRS TheaterSound HD uses the TV's speakers to simulate surround sound for an immersive listening experience.
  • Dolby Digital Plus and Dolby Pulse technologies Optimize the TV's sound quality during playback from a connected device, such as a mobile phone or tablet (not included).
  • Inputs Include 2 HDMI and 1 component.
  • Outputs Include 1 optical digital audio.
  • 2 HDMI inputs HDMI cable not included. High-speed HDMI cable is the only connection that can deliver a full HDTV experience with a full 1080p picture and digital surround sound.
  • USB port For quick connection of a digital camera or other USB device.

products.name: Samsung - 55" Class (54-5/8" Diag.) - LED - 1080p - 120Hz - HDTV
products.description:
This Samsung UN55FH6003FXZA TV features 1080p native resolution, a CMR (Clear Motion Rate) of 240 and Wide Color Enhancer Plus for sharp, vibrant images. A USB 2.0 port lets you play movies or music from a compatible device via ConnectShare Movie.

What's Included

  • Samsung 55" Class - LED - 1080p - 120Hz - HDTV
  • Stand
  • Remote with battery
  • Power cable
  • Owner's manual

Product Features

  • 54-5/8" screen measured diagonally from corner to corner For optimal viewing in large rooms.
  • VESA 400mm x 400mm compliant and mini wall-mount compatible For simple wall mounting. Included stand enables stable placement.
  • Wide Color Enhancer Plus Expands the color range for a vivid viewing experience, ideal when watching older film productions and standard-definition content.
  • CMR (Clear Motion Rate) of 240 Ensures sharp picture quality, deep contrast and minimal distortion when viewing fast-moving, action-packed images.
  • 1080p display Provides a highly detailed picture and is ideal for 1080p-capable content, including Blu-ray movies.
  • Dolby Digital Plus/Pulse Optimizes sound quality when viewing and listening to content, such as Internet movies and music, played back from wired or wireless mobile devices and PCs.
  • DTS Premium Audio and DTS 2.0 processing Along with SRS TheaterSound technology deliver immersive surround sound.
  • Auto volume leveler Prevents fluctuations in sound and is ideal for night viewing.
  • Inputs Include 2 HDMI, 1 component, 1 shared composite and 1 RF.
  • 2 HDMI inputs HDMI cable not included. High-speed HDMI cable is the only connection that can deliver a full HDTV experience with a full 1080p picture and digital surround sound.
  • USB 2.0 port For quick connection of a digital camera or other USB device. ConnectShare Movie lets you watch videos, play music or view photos from your compatible device.
  • Useful additional features Include closed captioning, game mode, auto power off and clock and on/off timer.

products.name: Samsung - 40" Class (40" Diag.) - LED - 1080p - 60Hz - Smart - HDTV
products.description:
With a Clear Motion Rate of 120 and 1080p resolution, this Samsung UN40H5500AFXZA LED HDTV showcases movies, games, sporting events and more in stunning clarity. Two USB ports allow you to enjoy media stored on compatible devices.

What's Included

  • Samsung 40" Class - LED - 1080p - 60Hz - Smart - HDTV
  • Square stand
  • Universal remote (TM1260C) with 2 AAA batteries
  • IR extender cable
  • Owner's manual

Product Features

  • 40" screen measured diagonally from corner to corner For optimal viewing in medium-size rooms.
  • Ultraslim design (1-9/10" deep) Ideal for wall mounting (with optional mounting kit, not included). VESA 200mm x 200mm compliant. Included square stand allows stable placement.
  • Connect to the Internet For access to Netflix, Pandora, Skype, Facebook, YouTube, Hulu Plus, HBO GO and ESPN ScoreCenter. Built-in Wi-Fi enables simple wireless connectivity.
  • Clear Motion Rate of 120 Helps prevent blurring and ghosting during intense action sequences.
  • 1080p display Provides a highly detailed picture and is ideal for 1080p-capable content, including Blu-ray movies.
  • DTS Studio Sound and DTS Premium Sound 5.1 technologies Along with Dolby MS10 technology and a 10W, full-range, down-firing speaker system provide a lush soundscape.
  • Sound leveler Helps prevent volume fluctuations and is ideal for night viewing.
  • Inputs Include 3 HDMI, 1 component video and 1 composite A/V.
  • Outputs Include 1 audio.
  • 3 HDMI inputs HDMI cable not included. High-speed HDMI cable is the only connection that can deliver a full HDTV experience with a full 1080p picture and digital surround sound.
  • Built-in Ethernet port Lets you connect your TV to your home network.
  • 2 USB ports Allow you to enjoy media stored on compatible devices. Also support firmware upgrades and service.
  • Useful additional features Include a sleep timer and channel labeling.

products.name: Samsung - 55" Class (54-5/8" Diag.) - LED - 1080p - 240Hz - Smart - 3D - HDTV
products.description:
This Samsung UN55F8000BFXZA 55" LED 3D HDTV delivers vibrant visuals at up to 1080p. To build a complete 3D home theater system, we recommend you purchase a 3D Blu-ray player, high-speed HDMI cable and an A/V receiver that is compatible with 3D products.

What's Included

  • Samsung 55" Class - LED - 1080p - 240Hz - Smart - 3D - HDTV
  • Stand
  • Smart Touch remote
  • 4 pairs of active 3D glasses
  • Owner's manual

Product Features

  • 54-5/8" screen measured diagonally from corner to corner For optimal viewing in large rooms.
  • Ultraslim design (1-1/2" deep) Ideal for wall mounting (with optional mounting kit, not included). VESA 400mm x 400mm compliant.
  • Connect to the Internet Via built-in Wi-Fi, so you can browse the Web, access Facebook and Twitter, stream your favorite movies and shows, download apps and more. S-Recommendation feature suggests live TV, on-demand movies and apps.
  • 3D technology Delivers stunning visuals for a new dimension of entertainment (4 pairs of active 3D glasses included).
  • Micro Dimming Ultimate technology Scans multiple image zones and adjusts brightness to deliver deep, dark tones and bright whites and reduce halo effect and distortion for vibrant images.
  • Precision Black technology Dims LEDs behind dark areas of an image to enhance contrast while retaining brightness for true-to-life detail.
  • Clear Motion Rate 1200 technology Enables the panel to reproduce sharp, clear visuals during fast-action scenes.
  • 1080p display Provides a highly detailed picture and is ideal for 1080p-capable content, including Blu-ray movies.
  • DTS Premium Audio 5.1 Delivers thrilling virtual surround sound. DNSE+ (Digital Natural Sound Engine) sound enhancement system lets you easily customize audio with a variety of equalizer settings as well as additional signal processing.
  • Dolby Digital Plus and Dolby Pulse technologies Optimize the TV's sound quality during playback from a variety of connected devices, including PCs, mobile phones and tablets (not included).
  • Inputs Include 4 HDMI, 1 component video and 2 composite A/V (1 shared with component).
  • 4 HDMI inputs HDMI cable not included. High-speed HDMI cable is the only connection that can deliver a full HDTV experience with a full 1080p picture and digital surround sound.
  • 3 USB ports For quick connection of a digital camera or other USB device.
  • Useful additional features Include a built-in pop-up camera, Smart Interaction 2.0 enhanced face, gesture and voice recognition, Samsung Smart View and an intuitive Smart Hub navigation menu.

products.name: Samsung - 48" Class (47-5/8" Diag.) - LED - 1080p - 120Hz - Smart - 3D - HDTV
products.description:
This Samsung UN48H6400AFXZA HDTV features built-in Wi-Fi for access to Web content. To build a complete 3D home theater system, we recommend you purchase a 3D Blu-ray player, high-speed HDMI cable and an A/V receiver that is compatible with 3D products.

What's Included

  • Samsung 48" Class - LED - 1080p - 120Hz - Smart - 3D - HDTV
  • Edge quad swivel stand
  • Smart Touch remote
  • 2 pairs of active 3D glasses (SSG-5150GB)
  • Owner's manual

Product Features

  • 47-5/8" screen measured diagonally from corner to corner For optimal viewing in large rooms.
  • VESA 400mm x 400mm compliant For simple wall mounting (with optional mounting kit, not included). Included edge quad stand swivels to help you find a comfortable viewing angle.
  • Connect to the Internet Smart Hub offers access to Netflix, Pandora, Skype, Facebook, YouTube, Hulu Plus, HBO GO and ESPN ScoreCenter. Built-in Wi-Fi enables simple wireless connectivity.
  • S Recommendation Provides suggestions for movies and shows based on your viewing preferences. A full browser lets you easily locate Web content, and a quad-core processor delivers enhanced performance.
  • Screen mirroring Allows you to stream TV content to a compatible cell phone, computer or tablet. AllShare enables you to stream content to and from a compatible device. Voice control lets you search for content and operate the TV by speaking.
  • 3D technology Delivers stunning visuals for a new dimension of entertainment. Two pairs of active 3D glasses (SSG-5150GB) let you share an immersive viewing experience.
  • Clear Motion Rate of 480 Helps prevent blurring and ghosting when viewing fast-paced action scenes.
  • Micro Dimming technology Enhances contrast to provide deep blacks and vibrant whites. Wide Color Enhancer Plus delivers an expansive spectrum of hues.
  • 1080p display Provides a highly detailed picture and is ideal for 1080p-capable content, including Blu-ray movies.
  • DTS Premium Sound 5.1 decoding with DTS Studio Sound processing Creates an immersive soundscape and converts 2-channel audio to a 5.1 DTS surround sound track. Dolby MS10 technology offers robust audio.
  • 3D Sound Plus Analyzes the depth of on-screen 3D images and synchronizes sound for lifelike sonic output.
  • Inputs Include 4 HDMI and 1 shared component/composite.
  • 4 HDMI inputs HDMI cable not included. High-speed HDMI cable is the only connection that can deliver a full HDTV experience with a full 1080p picture and digital surround sound.
  • Built-in Ethernet port Lets you connect your TV to your home network.
  • 3 USB ports With ConnectShare Movie capability allow you to enjoy videos, music and photos stored on a compatible device.
